attributes.action: Should the gov ban on schools holidays agency which are charging too much money.
attributes.additional_details: The school holidays are all ways high and it's just not fair on the families and the teachers who work so hard. The government should look into it very seriously matter. The tickets  price should be fair all year around.
attributes.background: The teachers only get time off from school when it's school holidays, and the families have to pay a lot money to take them abroad. Can the government put a stop on these travel agencies.
